Image.Alt: Three people stand in front of the American flag and troop flags. The two on the right are in class A uniforms. Ben is in the middle.
Two woman stand next to Ben, who is in the middle.
Image.Caption: To the left of Ben is Patty Racz, a long time educator of Schodack Central School District.

Image.Alt: Two people in class A uniforms smile for the camera in front of the American and Troop flags.
Image.Caption: Ben stands with his father and Troop 53 Scoutmaster, Jeffrey Brewer.

Image.Alt: Two people in class A uniforms smile for the camera in front of the American Flag.
Ben stands next to an American flag.
Four people stand in front of a room behind a podium. Ben is giving the scout sign.
Image.Caption: Ben's Eagle Scout Ceremony took place at Peter Andrews VFW Memorial Post.

Image.Alt: Ben giving a speech from behind a podium.
Seven people stand smiling for the camera.
Image.Caption: Ben and family stand with several local politicians.
